Articles.Content: Reentry, a quick little image I drew!
Nice! Too bad he is reentrying with like 10 km/s and has no parachute

no parachute

I was gonna say that; he has plenty of reason to scream XD. This is very timely for me considering I can't figure out how to re-enter with a particular ship from high velocities without DRE reminding me that it's there (even after patching the infernal "disappearing parachute" glitch). Today's challenge is to land the sucker.

I love the art style though. Looks like it was done quickly, but with a keen eye for detail.
